personalInformation.name: Eduardo Takeo
personalInformation.presentationMessage: I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences for the web.

feed.summary:
Frontend Developer with 5 Years of Experience

React Skilled professional with solid experience in developing modern and responsive user interfaces using React and its ecosystem.

 Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and libraries such as Redux and Styled-Components, with a strong understanding of agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban).

 Focused on building high-performance applications with excellent user experiences, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions. Proactive, with strong problem-solving skills and a commitment to staying updated on technological trends to apply best practices in frontend development.
